content.text: 1 1/2 cups chocolate cookie crumbs
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 1/2 cups chocolate cookie crumbs" )

content.text: 2 tablespoons white sugar
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 tablespoons white sugar" )

content.text: 1/4 cup butter, melted
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1/4 cup butter, melted" )

content.text: 1/4 cup semisweet chocolate chips
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1/4 cup semisweet chocolate chips" )

content.text: 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1/4 cup heavy whipping cream" )

content.text: 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened" )

content.text: 1 cup white sugar
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 cup white sugar" )

content.text: 1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder" )

content.text: 3 eggs
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "3 eggs" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 teaspoon vanilla extract" )

content.text: 1 1/2 cups semisweet chocolate chips
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "1 1/2 cups semisweet chocolate chips" )

content.text: 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream
content.eamr: ( ing-11 "1/4 cup heavy whipping cream" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
content.eamr: ( ing-12 "1 teaspoon vanilla extract" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@35:48 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan.
2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs"@33:66 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "2 tablespoons sugar"@68:87 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "melted butter"@93:106 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Press"@3:8 / AC
		:gol ( "the bottom"@14:24 / OTHER )
		:todo ( tool-3-0 "1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "350 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-4-1 "175 degrees C"@26:39 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "10 minutes"@45:55 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Allow to cool.
6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "heat"@41:45 / AC
		:subtask ( purp-7-0 "To Make Filling"@3:18 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "a small saucepan"@23:39 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "1/4 cup whipping cream"@46:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "1/4 cup chocolate chips"@73:96 / FOOD )
		:simultaneous ( ac-7-1 "stirring"@98:106 / AC )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until chips are melted"@119:141 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "beat"@27:31 / AC
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "a large mixing bowl"@6:25 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "cream cheese"@32:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "1 cup of sugar"@49:63 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until smooth"@64:76 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Add cocoa and beat well.
10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Add"@4:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "eggs"@8:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-10-1 "beat"@17:21 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "on low"@22:28 / OTHER )
		:until ( cond-10-0 "until just blended"@29:47 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "Stir in"@4:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "1 teaspoon vanilla"@12:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "reserved chocolate mixture"@35:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-11-0 "until blended"@62:75 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 12) Pour over crust.
13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set.
content.eamr:
( inst-13 / R
	:inform ( ac-13-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:heat ( temp-13-0 "325 degrees F"@12:25 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-13-1 "165 degrees C"@27:40 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-13-0 "45 to 50 minutes"@46:62 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-13-0 "until center is almost set"@66:92 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling.
content.eamr:
( inst-14 / R
	:inform ( ac-14-0 "heat"@42:46 / AC
		:subtask ( purp-14-0 "To Make Topping"@4:19 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-14-0 "a small saucepan"@24:40 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "1/4 cup whipping cream"@47:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "1 teaspoon vanilla"@74:92 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-14-0 "until just before boiling"@93:118 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over.
16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl.
17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-17 / R
	:inform ( ac-17-1 "Pour in"@4:11 / AC
		:ppt ( "the hot cream"@12:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-17-0 "stir"@30:34 / AC
		:instrument ( tool-17-0 "a spoon"@40:47 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-17-0 "until smooth"@48:60 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.
